text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Business day" means any calendar day except Sunday or the following business holidays: New Year's Day, Washington's Birthday, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Columbus Day, Veterans' Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.

"Consumer goods" and "consumer services" mean:
Goods or services purchased, leased, or rented primarily for personal, family, or household purposes; and
Courses of instruction or training regardless of the purpose for which they are taken.

section.section:
"Door-to-door sale" means a sale, lease, or rental of consumer goods or consumer services under single or multiple contracts with a purchase price of $25 or more, in which:
The seller or his representative personally solicits the sale, including a solicitation in response to or following an invitation by the buyer; and
The buyer's agreement or offer to purchase is made at a place other than the place of business of the seller.

text.section: "Person" includes an individual, corporation, business trust, statutory trust, estate, trust, partnership, association, two or more persons having a joint or common interest, or any other legal or commercial entity.
"Place of business" means the main or permanent branch office or local address of a seller.
"Purchase price" means the total price paid or to be paid for the consumer goods or consumer services, including all interest and service charges.
"Seller" means a person engaged in the door-to-door sale of consumer goods or consumer services.
